attributes.action: Change the GCSE science exam from some equation to all equation.
attributes.additional_details: Is it really fair that students have to remember so much, whilst also doing revision for other exams. we have to remember it and recall it perfectly under pressured conditions, on top of loads of other stresses, then we wait for some stranger to judge whether or not you are worthy of a good grade or not.
attributes.background: Last year, lots of students struggled with GCSE SCIENCE as it was a closed equation Because of this many failed. How can they expect us to remember all the equation and how to use them.
